body_html:
@jw447 I am experiencing the same issue on both a 4 GPUs and a 2 GPUs machine. I have been playing around with configurations and so far I have noticed that the crash only happens if gpu:1 is being called. I tried using only gpu:1 but encountered the same problem. On the other end, the same script using with tf.device('gpu:0') works fine.

Did you find a solution in the end? Was the problem entirely absent on tensorflow from source?I think the tensorflow install I am working with was done using pip.
